name: It turns out that I am the second generation of demons
author: 九夏动漫
content: The protagonist, Li Xianyu, on his 20th birthday, learned about his origins. He received an inheritance from his biological father, Li Wuxiang: a house, two hundred thousand in savings, and the Black Water Spirit Orb. After ingesting the Black Water Spirit Orb, he gave birth to Great-Grandma……
